alert.note: Alert for Texas (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 14 at 6:09PM CDT until May 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LACLEDE...SOUTHWESTERN PULASKI AND NORTHWESTERN TEXAS COUNTIES... At 609 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles west of Fort Leonard Wood, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Fort Leonard Wood... Plato... Competition... Lynchburg... Dry Knob... Falcon... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
